casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Lynwood Eugene HARRIS, Jr. No. 391P14. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Brendan O'Donnell, for Harris, Lynwood Eugene (Jr.). Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Jennifer Harjo, Wilmington. W. Clark Everett.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 20th of October 2014 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th of October 2014 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused.
